    VizualizeÂ¶

    Note

    All vizualization methods in this module are integrated in the CatmaProject class and the AnnotationCollection class.

    plot_annotations(ac, y_axis: str = 'tag', color_prop: str = 'tag')Â¶

    Creates interactive Plotly Scatter Plot to a explore a annotation collection.

    Parameters

    • ac (AnnotationCollection) â gitma.AnnotationCollection

    • y_axis (str, optional) â The columns in AnnotationCollection DataFrame used for y axis. Defaults to âtagâ.

    • color_prop (str, optional) â A Propertyâs name used in the AnnotationCollection . Defaults to None.

    Returns

    Plotly scatter plot.

    Return type

    go.Figure

    plot_annotation_progression(project) â plotly.graph_objs._figure.FigureÂ¶

    plot_scaled_annotations(ac, tag_scale: Optional[dict] = None, bin_size: int = 50, smoothing_window: int = 100) â NoneÂ¶

    Plots a graph with scaled annotations. This function is still under development.

    Parameters

    • ac (AnnotationCollection) â A CATMA

    • tag_scale (dict, optional) â description. Defaults to None.

    • bin_size (int, optional) â description. Defaults to 50.

    • smoothing_window (int, optional) â description. Defaults to 100.

    Raises

    Exception â description

    plot_interactive(catma_project, color_col: str = 'annotation collection') â plotly.graph_objs._figure.FigureÂ¶

    This function generates one Plotly scatter plot per annotated document in a CATMA project. By default the colors represent the annotation collections. By that they canât be deactivated with the interactive legend.

    Parameters

    • catma_project (CatmaProject) â The plotted project.

    • color_col (str, optional) â âannotation collectionâ, âannotatorâ, âtagâ or any property with the prefix âprop:â. Defaults to âannotation collectionâ.

    Returns

    Plotly scatter plot.

    Return type

    go.Figure

    compare_annotation_collections(catma_project, annotation_collections: list, color_col: str = 'tag') â plotly.graph_objs._figure.FigureÂ¶

    Plots annotations of multiple annotation collections of the same texts as line plot.

    Parameters

    • catma_project (CatmaProject) â description

    • annotation_collections (list) â A list of annotation collection names.

    • color_col (str, optional) â Either âtagâ or one property name with prefix âprop:â. Defaults to âtagâ.

    Raises

    ValueError â If one of the annotation collectionâs names does not exist.

    Returns

    Plotly Line Plot.

    Return type

    go.Figure
